# numberOfColumns

**Instance Property**

The number of columns in the table.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var numberOfColumns: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

The value in this property includes table columns that are currently hidden.

## Table Dimensions

- **numberOfRows**: The number of rows in the table.

items.description: The number of rows in the table.
items.name: numberOfRows
